name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LAiPIC.AI: Quickly turn URL links into AI video ads

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your swift & powerful AI video maker: A simple instruction can turn URL links into AI video ads.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collect product information from the detail pages of selected products on leading international e-commerce platforms.

Using LAiPIC.AI extension, you can effortlessly capture and analyze detailed product information, then assist in converting it into a video while minimizing the need for manual operation!

ğŸ”—Advanced Data Capture : After installing our extension, utilize advanced data models to accurately capture and identify product information.

ğŸ”—Free extension: Our extension is entirely free; you can download and use it directly from the Chrome Web Store.
ğŸ”—Strict Compliance: We strictly adhere to platform regulations, safeguarding user privacy and rights.

How to Use:
ğŸ”Click the "Add to Chrome" button and add the extension to your browser toolbar.
ğŸ”Open the website: https://www.laipic.ai/

ğŸ”LAiPIC.AI will automatically capture and analyze the product information from the link and assist in generating the corresponding video.
